source.name: EPA Laws and Regulations Gateway
source.description: The EPA Laws and Regulations Gateway serves as a central hub that connects users to a broad array of legal information related to environmental regulation.  The Gateway provides summaries of Environmental Laws and Executive Orders that EPA is charged with administering.  Summaries are also provided for Laws and Executive Orders that influence EPA's regulatory process.  The Gateway also provides access to a number of tools that enable users to keep track of and participate in the development of new EPA regulations, and to learn how to comply with existing regulations.
